params._tokenContract: The address of the ERC-721 token
params._tokenId: The id of the ERC-721 token

params._bidCurrency: The address of the ERC-20 token, or address(0) for ETH, that users must bid with
params._duration: The length of time the auction should run after the first bid
params._findersFeeBps: The fee to send to the referrer of the winning bid
params._reservePrice: The minimum bid amount to start the auction
params._sellerFundsRecipient: The address to send funds to once the auction is complete
params._startTime: The time that users can begin placing bids
params._tokenContract: The address of the ERC-721 token
params._tokenId: The id of the ERC-721 token

cancelAuction(address,uint256).notice: Cancels the auction for a given NFT

createAuction(address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Creates an auction for a given NFT

createBid(address,uint256,uint256,addres.notice: Places a bid on the auction for a given NFT

setAuctionReservePrice(address,uint256,u.notice: Updates the reserve price for a given auction

settleAuction(address,uint256).notice: Ends the auction for a given NFT

userdoc.notice: Interface for Reserve Auction Finders ERC-20
